QuestData.Title: Path Less Traveled
QuestData.Description: The toughest roads often have the most to teach us, $c. I will no doubt learn a great deal from following the path of Shaohao.$b$bMany years ago Shaohao traveled to the highest peak in Kun-Lai to seek the guidance of the Jade Serpent. I too will travel to Seeker's Point in search of wisdom.$b$bPerhaps you would be interested in a journey such as this? If so speak with Uncle Cloverleaf. He will help you prepare.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Uncle Cloverleaf in Onekeg.
QuestData.RewardText: Travel to Seeker's Point will require much good fortune, $c. Hopefully you have many lucky trinkets!
